description: About 600 recordings held by Manx National Heritage will be digitised as part of a British Library project.
title: Isle of Man 'rich sound archive' to be digitised
title_page: Isle of Man 'rich sound archive' to be digitised - BBC News
maintext: The MNH said alongside the conversations with the Manx speakers and interviews with people held in internment camps on the island in World War Two, the recordings also include "first-hand memories of working in the island's busy guest houses" and the atmosphere of the last night of Bushy's Brew Pub in Douglas on 9 January 1998.
